dublin_core.dcvalue: The Safe Delivery App is a smartphone application that aims to improve the quality of emergency obstetric and neonatal care. It trains birth attendants in the management of normal and complicated deliveries. Push messaging spur the HCW to update their knowledge and enables easy access to essential drug lists.
Ida Boas, Maternity Foundation, Email: ida@maternity.dk, | Stine Lund, University of Copenhagen, Email: stine_lund@dadlnet.dk

Provider Training and Education, Newborn Health
